title: Designing Motherhood: Things that Make or Break Our Births, an interview with Michelle Fisher Millar and Amber Winick, part 1
itunes:title: Designing Motherhood: Things that Make or Break Our Births, an interview with Michelle Fisher Millar and Amber Winick, part 1
description:
In our two-part episode this week, we explore the material culture of motherhood and the physical object worn to support pregnancy and beyond.

RECOMMENDED READING:

  • Fisher Millar, Michelle and Amber Winick. Designing Motherhood: Things that Make or Break Our Births. Cambridge: MIT Press, 2021.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
